how_to_use: Use this detox + mask routine at least 1x per week to reset hair + scalp and repair damage. ..PEPTIDE PREP detox shampoo.- Prep the hair for maximum damage repair by massaging the detox shampoo into the hair and scalp..- Rinse thoroughly...Leave-In Molecular Repair Hair Mask.- After shampooing, do NOT condition.- Towel-dry hair..- Apply 1-3 pumps of molecular repair hair mask to mid-length and ends. Begin with 1 pump and build as needed. .- Let sit for 4 minutes..- Do not rinse out..- Style as usual...Pro Tip:.- Highly concentrated formulas. Start with the minimum recommended amount and build as needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I dye my hair regularly and style it with heated tools several times each week, which has caused it to become significantly damaged. Two pumps is all I need for each occasion and it never leaves my hair feeling weighed down or greasy.  However, combining the mask with the peptide prep detox shampoo has been a gamechanger.  The shampoo has a citrus scent and a dark color due to the charcoal, but it doesn't deposit any pigment in my light hair.  It rinses out cleanly without making my dry strands feel stripped of moisture.  And best of all, it removes all build up from products, oils, and dirt so when I apply the mask afterwards it can reach the innermost layers of hair without any obstacles.  When I use both of these products together, my hair feels even softer and smoother than when I use the mask alone.

reviews.review_text: Transform Your Hair with K18 Biomimetic Hairscience Peptide Prep Clarifying Detox Shampoo and Leave-in Molecular Repair Hair Mask The K18 Biomimetic Hairscience Peptide Prep Clarifying Detox Shampoo and Leave-in Molecular Repair Hair Mask is a game-changer for my damaged hair. Utilizing biomimetic science, it targets and repairs the broken keratin bonds, resulting in stronger, healthier, and more vibrant hair.
